title: Mummy priest
data:

| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | An ancient servant of a long forgotten god, embalmed and cursed to walk in undeath for all eternity.It will inflict a necromantic curse on its foe when destroyed. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Mummy priests** are the animated remains of powerful practitioners of [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy"). Although they can summon demonic or undead reinforcements, their biggest strength lies in their ability to [smite](/Smite "Smite") or [torment](/Torment "Torment") you at will. Their [death curses](/Death_curse "Death curse") are also some of the worse ones you will encounter. Fortunately, they are slow and easily run from if you turn around as soon as you see them. Mummy priests are found in [the Tomb](/The_Tomb "The Tomb") or near its entrance, in the [Vestibule of Hell](/Vestibule_of_Hell "Vestibule of Hell") guarding the entrance to [Tartarus](/Tartarus "Tartarus"), and on Tomb-themed [Ziggurat](/Ziggurat "Ziggurat") floors.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                             |                                                     |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon")                | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Smiting](/Smiting "Smiting") (7-17)                        | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Symbol of Torment](/Symbol_of_Torment "Symbol of Torment") | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Summon Undead](/Summon_Undead "Summon Undead")             | [Priest flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Mummy priests are extremely dangerous opponents, tormenting and smiting you from a safe distance while their summons and mummy allies slow you down. Don't let them live any longer than you have to.
- Catching them with [Silence](/Silence "Silence") will shut down all of their spells, making them much more manageable.
- [Javelins](/Javelin "Javelin") are useful for killing mummy priests when they hide behind their summons.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), mummy priests could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").
html:
Mummy priest

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all mummies, see list of mummies.

mummy priest M 
HP 42-87
HD 10
XP 1093
Speed 8
AC 8
EV 7
Will 120
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)


Resistances rC+
rElec
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type mummy, mummy
Flags Speaks
An ancient servant of a long forgotten god, embalmed and cursed to walk in undeath for all eternity.

It will inflict a necromantic curse on its foe when destroyed.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Mummy priests are the animated remains of powerful practitioners of Necromancy. Although they can summon demonic or undead reinforcements, their biggest strength lies in their ability to smite or torment you at will. Their death curses are also some of the worse ones you will encounter. Fortunately, they are slow and easily run from if you turn around as soon as you see them. Mummy priests are found in the Tomb or near its entrance, in the Vestibule of Hell guarding the entrance to Tartarus, and on Tomb-themed Ziggurat floors.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Summon Demon Priest flag
Slot2 Smiting (7-17) Priest flag
Slot3 Symbol of Torment Priest flag
Slot4 Summon Undead Priest flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Mummy priests are extremely dangerous opponents, tormenting and smiting you from a safe distance while their summons and mummy allies slow you down. Don't let them live any longer than you have to.
  • Catching them with Silence will shut down all of their spells, making them much more manageable.
  • Javelins are useful for killing mummy priests when they hide behind their summons.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, mummy priests could see invisible.
